overview: Saayori is a Bengali short film starring Anindita Bose, Indrashis Roy, Indrajit Mazumder and Koushik Roy. Saayori is an independent girl in an uncommitted relationship with Ryan. Her parents want her to marry Abhro but she isn’t ready yet and wants to focus on her career. Will Saayori take the right decision or succumb to parental pressure?
title: Bhalobashar Shohor - Saayori
